com.feilong.core.util

Class SortUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.feilong.core.util.SortUtil

  • public final class SortUtil
extends Object
    专注于排序的工具类.

    说明:

    1. 该类的初衷之一,通常如果直接使用jdk里面的sort方法,比如 
       Arrays.sort(Object[])
      或者 
       Collections.sort(List)
      由于这些方法是 void类型的,通常我们需要写2至3行代码
    2. 第二,该类对bean list的排序更加简单便捷
    Since:
    1.8.0
    Author:
    feilong

    • Method Detail

      • sortArray

        public static <T> T[] sortArray(T[] arrays)
        对 数组 arrays 进行排序.

        示例:

         sortArray(toArray(5, 10, 3, 2)  =   [2,3,5,10]

        以前代码需要写成:

         
 public static String toSalesPropertiesIdsJson(Long...itemPropertiesIdLongs){
     Arrays.sort(itemPropertiesIdLongs);
     return JsonUtil.format(itemPropertiesIdLongs, 0, 0);
 }
        现在可以重构成: 
         
 public static String toSalesPropertiesIdsJson(Long...itemPropertiesIdLongs){
     return JsonUtil.format(sortArray(itemPropertiesIdLongs), 0, 0);
 }
        再如: 
         
 // 得到默认分类,目前是最小的
 private Long getDefaultCategoryId(Long[] categoriesIds){
     Arrays.sort(categoriesIds);
     return categoriesIds[0];
 }
        可以重构成: 
         
 // 得到默认分类,目前是最小的
 private Long getDefaultCategoryId(Long[] categoriesIds){
     return sortArray(categoriesIds)[0];
 }
        Type Parameters:
        T - the generic type
        Parameters:
        arrays - the arrays
        Returns:
        如果 array 是null,返回 empty array
        Since:
        1.8.7 change T... to T[]
        See Also:
        Arrays.sort(Object[])

      • sortArray

        @SafeVarargs
public static <T> T[] sortArray(T[] arrays,
                                             Comparator<T>... comparators)
        对 数组 arrays使用 comparator 进行排序.

        示例:

        场景: 对字符串数组先按照长度比较,如果长度相等,那么再按照字母比较 

         
 String[] arrays = { "almn", "fba", "cba" };
 
 Comparator<String> comparator = new Comparator<String>(){
 
     @Override
     public int compare(String s1,String s2){
         Integer length = s1.length();
         Integer length2 = s2.length();
 
         //先判断长度,长度比较
         int compareTo = length.compareTo(length2);
 
         //如果长度相等,那么比较自己本身的顺序
         if (0 == compareTo){
             compareTo = s1.compareTo(s2);
         }
         return compareTo;
     }
 };
 sortArray(arrays, comparator);
 
 assertArrayEquals(toArray("cba", "fba", "almn"), arrays);
        Type Parameters:
        T - the generic type
        Parameters:
        arrays - the arrays
        comparators - the comparators
        Returns:
        如果 array 是null,返回 empty array
        如果 comparators 是null或者empty,直接返回 arrays
        Since:
        1.8.2 change to varargs parameter comparator, 1.8.7 change method name
        See Also:
        Arrays.sort(Object[], Comparator)

      • sortList

        public static <T extends Comparable<? super T>> List<T> sortList(List<T> list)
        对 集合 list 进行排序.

        说明:

        1. Collections.sort 底层就是调用的是 Arrays.sort

        示例:

         sortList(toList(5, 10, 3, 2))       = [2,3,5,10]
        Type Parameters:
        T - the generic type
        Parameters:
        list - the list
        Returns:
        如果 list 是null,返回 Collections.emptyList()
        Since:
        1.8.7 change method name
        See Also:
        Collections.sort(List)

      • sortList

        @SafeVarargs
public static <O> List<O> sortList(List<O> list,
                                                Comparator<O>... comparators)
        对集合 list,使用指定的 comparators 进行排序.

        示例:

        场景: 将 user list 按照 id进行排序 

         List<User> list = new ArrayList<>();
 list.add(new User(12L, 18));
 list.add(new User(2L, 36));
 list.add(new User(5L, 22));
 list.add(new User(1L, 8));
 
 SortUtil.sortList(list, new PropertyComparator<User>("id"));
 LOGGER.debug(JsonUtil.format(list));
        返回: 
         [
  {"id": 1,"age": 8},
  {"id": 2,"age": 36},
  {"id": 5,"age": 22},
  {"id": 12,"age": 18}
 ]

        当然对于上述示例,你可以直接调用: 

         SortUtil.sortListByPropertyNamesValue(list, "id");

        我们再来个复杂点的例子: 将 user list 按照 "刘备" 排在 "关羽" 前面 进行排序,如果名字相同再按照 age进行排序 

         User guanyu = new User("关羽", 30);
 
 User liubei60 = new User("刘备", 60);
 User liubei25 = new User("刘备", 25);
 User liubei30 = new User("刘备", 30);
 User liubei10 = new User("刘备", 10);
 
 String[] names = { "刘备", "关羽" };
 List<User> list = CollectionsUtil.select(toList(liubei60, liubei30, liubei10, guanyu, liubei25), "name", names);
 sortList(
                 list, //
                 new PropertyComparator<User>("name", new FixedOrderComparator<>(names)),
                 new PropertyComparator<User>("age"));
        返回: 
         assertThat(list, contains(liubei10, liubei25, liubei30, liubei60, guanyu));
        Type Parameters:
        O - the generic type
        Parameters:
        list - the list
        comparators - the comparators
        Returns:
        如果 list 是null,返回 Collections.emptyList()
        如果 comparators 是null或者empty,直接返回 list
        如果 comparators length ==1,取 comparators[0]做排序;
        如果 comparators length > 1,转成 ComparatorUtils.chainedComparator(Comparator...)排序;
        Since:
        1.8.2, 1.8.7 change method name
        See Also:
        Collections.sort(List, Comparator)

      • sortListByPropertyNamesValue

        public static <O> List<O> sortListByPropertyNamesValue(List<O> list,
                                                       String... propertyNameAndOrders)
        对集合 list,按照指定属性的值(组合)进行排序.

        示例:

        场景: 将user list 先按照 id 再按照 age 进行排序 

         List<User> list = new ArrayList<>();
 list.add(new User(12L, 18));
 list.add(new User(2L, 36));
 list.add(new User(2L, 2));
 list.add(new User(2L, 30));
 list.add(new User(1L, 8));
 
 SortUtil.sortListByPropertyNamesValue(list, "id", "age");
 
 LOGGER.debug(JsonUtil.formatWithIncludes(list, "id", "age"));
        返回: 
         [
  {"id": 1,"age": 8},
  {"id": 2,"age": 2},
  {"id": 2,"age": 30},
  {"id": 2,"age": 36},
  {"id": 12,"age": 18}
 ]
        你还可以

        场景: 将user list 先按照 id desc 再按照 age asc 进行排序 

         User id12_age18 = new User(12L, 18);
 User id1_age8 = new User(1L, 8);
 User id2_age30 = new User(2L, 30);
 User id2_age2 = new User(2L, 2);
 User id2_age36 = new User(2L, 36);
 List<User> list = toList(id12_age18, id2_age36, id2_age2, id2_age30, id1_age8);
 
 sortListByPropertyNamesValue(list, "id desc", "age");
 
 assertThat(list, contains(id12_age18, id2_age2, id2_age30, id2_age36, id1_age8));
        Type Parameters:
        O - the generic type
        Parameters:
        list - the list
        propertyNameAndOrders - 属性名称和排序因子,

        格式可以是纯的属性名称, 比如 "name"; 也可以是属性名称+排序因子(以空格分隔),比如 "name desc"

        说明:

        关于属性名称
        泛型T对象指定的属性名称,Possibly indexed and/or nested name of the property to be modified,参见propertyName,
        该属性对应的value 必须实现 Comparable接口.
        关于排序因子
        可以没有排序因子
        如果有,值可以是asc(顺序),desc(倒序)两种;
        如果没有,默认按照asc(顺序)排序;
        此外,asc/desc忽略大小写
        Returns:
        如果 list 是null,返回 Collections.emptyList()
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - 如果 propertyNames 是null
        IllegalArgumentException - 如果 propertyNames 是empty ,或者有 null元素
        Since:
        1.8.7 change name
        See Also:
        BeanComparatorUtil.chainedComparator(String...), ComparatorUtils.chainedComparator(java.util.Comparator...), sortList(List, Comparator...)

      • sortListByFixedOrderPropertyValueArray

        @SafeVarargs
public static <O,V> List<O> sortListByFixedOrderPropertyValueArray(List<O> list,
                                                                                String propertyName,
                                                                                V... propertyValues)
        对 集合 list,属性 propertyName 按照固定顺序值 propertyValues 进行排序.

        示例:

        场景: 将user list中 "刘备" 排在 "关羽"前面 

         User zhangfei = new User("张飞", 23);
 User guanyu = new User("关羽", 30);
 User liubei = new User("刘备", 25);
 List<User> list = toList(zhangfei, guanyu, liubei);
 
 List<User> resultList = CollectionsUtil.select(list, "name", "刘备", "关羽");
 Collections.sort(resultList, new PropertyComparator<User>("name", new FixedOrderComparator<>("刘备", "关羽")));

        此时你可以直接调用: 

         List<User> resultList = CollectionsUtil.select(list, "name", "刘备", "关羽");
 SortUtil.sortListByFixedOrderPropertyValueArray(resultList, "name", "刘备", "关羽"));
        返回: 
         assertThat(resultList, contains(liubei, guanyu));
        Type Parameters:
        O - the generic type
        V - the value type
        Parameters:
        list - the list
        propertyName - 泛型O对象指定的属性名称,Possibly indexed and/or nested name of the property to be modified,参见 propertyName
        propertyValues - the property values
        Returns:
        如果 list 是null,返回 Collections.emptyList()
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - 如果 propertyName 是null,或者 propertyValues 是null
        IllegalArgumentException - 如果 propertyName 是blank
        Since:
        1.8.7 change method name
        See Also:
        BeanComparatorUtil.propertyComparator(String, Object...), sortList(List, Comparator...)

      • sortListByFixedOrderPropertyValueList

        public static <O,V> List<O> sortListByFixedOrderPropertyValueList(List<O> list,
                                                                  String propertyName,
                                                                  List<V> propertyValues)
        对 集合 list,属性 propertyName 按照固定顺序值 propertyValues 进行排序.

        示例:

        场景: 将user list中 "刘备" 排在 "关羽"前面 

         
 User zhangfei = new User("张飞", 23);
 User guanyu = new User("关羽", 30);
 User liubei = new User("刘备", 25);
 List<User> list = toList(zhangfei, guanyu, liubei);
 
 List<User> returnList = CollectionsUtil.select(list, "name", toList("刘备", "关羽"));
 returnList = sortListByFixedOrderPropertyValueList(returnList, "name", toList("刘备", "关羽"));
        返回: 
         assertThat(returnList, contains(liubei, guanyu));
        Type Parameters:
        O - the generic type
        V - the value type
        Parameters:
        list - the list
        propertyName - 泛型O对象指定的属性名称,Possibly indexed and/or nested name of the property to be modified,参见 propertyName
        propertyValues - the property values
        Returns:
        如果 list 是null,返回 Collections.emptyList()
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - 如果 propertyName 是null
        IllegalArgumentException - 如果 propertyName 是blank
        Since:
        1.8.7 change method name
        See Also:
        BeanComparatorUtil.propertyComparator(String, List), sortList(List, Comparator...)

      • sortMapByKeyAsc

        public static <K,V> Map<K,V> sortMapByKeyAsc(Map<K,V> map)
        按照key asc顺序排序.

        注意:

        1. 原 map 的顺序不变
        2. 该方法使用了 PropertyComparator,允许 null key,null key排在最前面
        3. 如果直接使用 TreeMap.TreeMap(Map),TreeMap不允许 key是null,如果有key是null,那么将会抛出NullPointerException

        示例:

         Map<String, Comparable> map = new HashMap<>();
 
 map.put("a", 123);
 map.put("c", 345);
 map.put(null, 1345);
 map.put("b", 8);
 
 LOGGER.debug(JsonUtil.format(SortUtil.sortMapByKeyAsc(map)));
        返回: 
         {
 null: 1345,
 "a": 123,
 "b": 8,
 "c": 345
 }
        Type Parameters:
        K - the key type
        V - the value type
        Parameters:
        map - the map
        Returns:
        如果 map 是null,返回 Collections.emptyMap()
        Since:
        1.8.0 move from MapUtil, 1.8.7 change method name
        See Also:
        TreeMap.TreeMap(Map)

      • sortMapByKeyDesc

        public static <K,V> Map<K,V> sortMapByKeyDesc(Map<K,V> map)
        按照key desc 倒序排序.

        注意:

        1. 原 map 的顺序不变
        2. 该方法使用了 PropertyComparator,允许 null key,null key排在最后面

        示例:

         Map<String, Comparable> map = new HashMap<>();
 
 map.put("a", 123);
 map.put("c", 345);
 map.put(null, 88);
 map.put("b", 8);
 
 LOGGER.debug(JsonUtil.format(SortUtil.sortMapByKeyDesc(map)));
        返回: 
         {
 "c": 345,
 "b": 8,
 "a": 123,
 null: 88
 }
        Type Parameters:
        K - the key type
        V - the value type
        Parameters:
        map - the map
        Returns:
        如果 map 是null,返回 Collections.emptyMap()
        Since:
        1.8.0 move from MapUtil, 1.8.7 change method name
        See Also:
        ReverseComparator.ReverseComparator(Comparator), PropertyComparator.PropertyComparator(String), sortMap(Map, Comparator)

      • sortMapByKeyFixOrder

        public static <K,V> Map<K,V> sortMapByKeyFixOrder(Map<K,V> map,
                                                  K... keys)
        按照key 指定名字顺序排序.

        注意:

        1. 原 map 的顺序不变

        示例:

         Map<String, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();
 
 map.put("DE", 99);
 map.put("L", 3428);
 map.put("O", 13);
 map.put("UN", 17);
 map.put("S", 6);
 
 //L-上市,S-暂停,DE-终止上市,UN-未上市
 Map<String, Integer> sortByKeyAsc = sortMapByKeyFixOrder(map, "L", "UN", "DE", "S", "O");
 
 LOGGER.debug(JsonUtil.format(sortByKeyAsc));
        返回: 
            {
        "L": 3428,
        "UN": 17,
        "S": 6,
        "DE": 99,
        "O": 13
    }
        Type Parameters:
        K - the key type
        V - the value type
        Parameters:
        map - the map
        keys - the keys
        Returns:
        如果 map 是null,返回 Collections.emptyMap()
        如果 keys 是null或者empty,原样返回 map
        Since:
        1.10.6
        See Also:
        PropertyComparator.PropertyComparator(String), sortMap(Map, Comparator)

      • sortMapByValueAsc

        public static <K,V extends Comparable<V>> Map<K,V> sortMapByValueAsc(Map<K,V> map)
        根据value 来顺序排序(asc).

        注意:

        1. 原 map 的顺序不变

        示例:

         Map<String, Comparable> map = new HashMap<>();
 map.put("a", 123);
 map.put("c", 345);
 map.put("b", 8);
 LOGGER.debug(JsonUtil.format(SortUtil.sortMapByValueAsc(map)));
        返回: 
         {
 "b": 8,
 "a": 123,
 "c": 345
 }
        Type Parameters:
        K - the key type
        V - the value type
        Parameters:
        map - the map
        Returns:
        如果 map 是null,返回 Collections.emptyMap()
        Since:
        1.8.0 move from MapUtil, 1.8.7 change name from sortByValueAsc
        See Also:
        sortMap(Map, Comparator)

      • sortMapByValueDesc

        public static <K,V extends Comparable<V>> Map<K,V> sortMapByValueDesc(Map<K,V> map)
        根据value 来倒序排序(desc).

        注意:

        1. 原 map 的顺序不变

        示例:

         Map<String, Comparable> map = new LinkedHashMap<>();
 
 map.put("a", 123);
 map.put("c", 345);
 map.put("b", 8);
 
 LOGGER.debug(JsonUtil.format(SortUtil.sortMapByValueDesc(map)));
        返回: 
         {
 "c": 345,
 "a": 123,
 "b": 8
 }
        Type Parameters:
        K - the key type
        V - the value type
        Parameters:
        map - the map
        Returns:
        如果 map 是null,返回 Collections.emptyMap()
        Since:
        1.8.0 move from MapUtil, 1.8.7 change method name from sortByValueDesc
        See Also:
        sortMap(Map, Comparator)

      • sortMap

        public static <K,V> Map<K,V> sortMap(Map<K,V> map,
                                     Comparator<Map.Entry<K,V>> mapEntryComparator)
        使用 基于 Entry 的 mapEntryComparator 来对 map进行排序.

        说明:

        1. 原 map 的顺序不变
        2. 由于是对Entry排序的, 既可以按照key来排序,也可以按照value来排序哦

        示例:

        比如有以下的map 
         Map<String, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();
 
 map.put("a13", 123);
 map.put("a2", 345);
 map.put("a8", 8);
        如果我们只是使用 : 
         LOGGER.debug(JsonUtil.format(SortUtil.sortByKeyAsc(map)));
        返回: 
         {
 "a13": 123,
 "a2": 345,
 "a8": 8
 }
        此时可以看出 a13是以字符串的形式进行比较的,我们可以使用以下的自定义的 Comparator,来达到排序的效果 
         PropertyComparator<Entry<String, Integer>> propertyComparator = new PropertyComparator<Map.Entry<String, Integer>>(
                 "key",
                 new RegexGroupNumberComparator("a(\\d*)"));
 LOGGER.debug(JsonUtil.format(SortUtil.sortMap(map, propertyComparator)));
        返回: 
         {
 "a2": 345,
 "a8": 8,
 "a13": 123
 }
        Type Parameters:
        K - the key type
        V - the value type
        Parameters:
        map - the map
        mapEntryComparator - 基于 Entry 的 Comparator
        Returns:
        如果 map 是null,返回 Collections.emptyMap()
        如果 mapEntryComparator 是null,抛出 NullPointerException
        Since:
        1.8.0 move from MapUtil, 1.8.7 change method name from sort
        See Also:
        Collections.sort(List, Comparator)
